casebody.data:
Isabella MENSAH
v.
Charles MENSAH Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 4, 2016 Josephine S. Miller, in support of the petition. Thomas S. Rome, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 219 , 143 A.3d 622 (2016), is denied.

ESPINOSA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
